# PED::GET_PED_STEALTH_MOVEMENT

## Summary
This command gets whether the ped is using stealthy movement

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns whether the entity is in stealth mode
